channel.title: Mouse recorder! Please!
channel.description: When you click it will record it and you can replay it again and again.

item.title: Mouse recorder! Please!
item.dc:creator: @alienware alienware
item.description:
@alienware wrote:

Its easy to do it manually with scar…
use the color picker tool to get the mouse co-ordinates.
use those coordinates in scar…
to left click…
clickmouse(x,y,true)

If you dont want scar…
You can try this demo at
http://www.jitbit.com/macrorecorder.aspx

Read full topic

item.title: Mouse recorder! Please!
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:3, topic:130976”]In lighter news - I made one of these in SCAR a while ago, but the coding was tragic. I really don’t know why I’m saying that - but I am. I’ll see if I can dig it up for you, but there are no promises. At all.
In fact, now that I think of it, I have reformatted my hard drive since then. If you are really that desperate for a ‘mouse recorder,’ use Google. There are plenty of free ones available on the net.
Just be warned that it will not work well with Runescape, for a few reasons. The main one, as XxKanexX already mentioned, is the fact that it is extremely detectable.

Farewell. Perhaps I’ll visit the SCAR section again in a year or so ;)[/quote]OK , thanks I will check google . But the problem is that I would’nt trust people becuase their probaly just scammers.

Read full topic

item.title: Mouse recorder! Please!
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

In lighter news - I made one of these in SCAR a while ago, but the coding was tragic. I really don’t know why I’m saying that - but I am. I’ll see if I can dig it up for you, but there are no promises. At all.
In fact, now that I think of it, I have reformatted my hard drive since then. If you are really that desperate for a ‘mouse recorder,’ use Google. There are plenty of free ones available on the net.
Just be warned that it will not work well with Runescape, for a few reasons. The main one, as XxKanexX already mentioned, is the fact that it is extremely detectable.

Farewell. Perhaps I’ll visit the SCAR section again in a year or so

Read full topic

item.title: Mouse recorder! Please!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

If you’re going to use it on Runescape, think again.
They will notice the same Mouse Movements and Ban you.

Read full topic
